forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 63F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers after midnight. Low 53F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. Becoming windy during the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. Becoming windy during the afternoon. High 61F. Winds NW at 25 to 35 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Gusty winds diminishing after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds NNW at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Gusty winds diminishing after midnight. Low 51F. NNW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High near 20C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 67F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 21C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High near 70F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 52F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High around 20C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 66F. NW winds at 5 to 10 mph, increasing to 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 9C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low near 50F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 63F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 9C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low around 50F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 62F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 51F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 17C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 64F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 17C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 64F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 52F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low around 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
